actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Automobile Information Disclosure Act to provide for the disclosure of fuel consumption by certain automobiles, under rules prescribed by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the disclosure of fuel consumption by automobiles, under rules prescribed by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Automobile Information Disclosure Act to provide for the disclosure of fuel consumption by certain automobiles, under rules prescribed by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, and for other purposes.
